mapper.select: SELECT * from machine m left join user u on u.id = m.customer where u.account = '${account}'

SELECT u.name as customerName, a.name as agent_name, m.*, m.id as machineId, ir.install_actual_time -- ir.install_charge_person, -- userInInstallRecord.name as install_charge_person_name
FROM machine m LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id=m.customer LEFT JOIN agent a on a.id =u.agent LEFT JOIN install_record ir ON ir.machine_nameplate = m.nameplate -- LEFT JOIN user userInInstallRecord ON userInInstallRecord.id = ir.install_charge_person
WHERE 1=1
-- AND customerName like CONCAT('%','${customerName}','%' ) AND u.account like CONCAT('%','${customerName}','%' )
AND a.name = '${agent}'
AND a.name like CONCAT('%','${agent}','%' )
and m.nameplate like CONCAT('%','${nameplate}','%' )
and m.order_num like CONCAT('%','${orderNum}','%' )
and m.machine_type like CONCAT('%','${machineType}','%' )
and m.is_old_machine like CONCAT('%','${machineWhereFrom}','%' )
-- AND u.customerName ='${customerName}' AND u.account ='${customerName}'
-- AND agent_name = '${agent}' AND a.name = '${agent}'
and m.nameplate = '${nameplate}'
and m.order_num = '${orderNum}'
and m.machine_type = '${machineType}'
and m.is_old_machine = '${machineWhereFrom}'
and m.status = #{status}
and DATE_FORMAT(install_actual_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') >= #{query_start_time_install}
and DATE_FORMAT(install_actual_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') <= #{query_finish_time_install}
ORDER By ir.install_actual_time DESC

SELECT m.nameplate, m.machine_type, m.x_distance, m.y_distance, m.head_distance, m.head_num, m.needle_num, ir.install_actual_time, ir.install_charge_person, userInInstallRecord. account AS install_charge_person_name, ir.install_status, mr.maintain_date_actual, mr.maintain_charge_person, userInMaintainRecord.`account` AS maintain_charge_person_name, mr.maintain_status, rr.repair_end_time, rr.repair_charge_person, userInRepairRecord.`account` AS repair_charge_person_name, rr.`status` AS repair_status, parts_info.parts_status -- , -- ir.id as installRecordId, -- mr.id as maintainRecordId, -- rr.id as repairRecordId FROM machine AS m LEFT JOIN install_record AS ir ON ir.machine_nameplate = m.nameplate LEFT JOIN maintain_record AS mr ON mr.machine_nameplate = m.nameplate LEFT JOIN repair_record AS rr ON rr.machine_nameplate = m.nameplate LEFT JOIN USER AS userInInstallRecord ON userInInstallRecord.id = ir.install_charge_person LEFT JOIN USER AS userInMaintainRecord ON userInMaintainRecord.id = mr.maintain_charge_person LEFT JOIN USER AS userInRepairRecord ON userInRepairRecord.id = rr.repair_charge_person
LEFT JOIN repair_actual_info as rai on rai.repair_record_id = rr.id LEFT JOIN parts_info on parts_info.repair_actual_info_id = rai.id
WHERE m.nameplate = #{nameplate} order by ir.install_actual_time desc, mr.maintain_date_actual desc, rr.repair_end_time desc

SELECT m.nameplate, m.machine_type, m.x_distance, m.y_distance, m.head_distance, m.head_num, m.needle_num, ir.install_actual_time, ir.install_charge_person, userInInstallRecord. account AS install_charge_person_name, ir.install_status, mr.maintain_date_actual, mr.maintain_charge_person, userInMaintainRecord.`account` AS maintain_charge_person_name, mr.maintain_status, rr.repair_end_time, rr.repair_charge_person, userInRepairRecord.`account` AS repair_charge_person_name, rr.`status` AS repair_status, parts_info.parts_status -- , -- ir.id as installRecordId, -- mr.id as maintainRecordId, -- rr.id as repairRecordId FROM machine as m LEFT JOIN install_record as ir on ir.machine_nameplate = m.nameplate LEFT JOIN maintain_record as mr on mr.machine_nameplate = m.nameplate LEFT JOIN repair_record as rr on rr.machine_nameplate = m.nameplate
LEFT JOIN user as userInInstallRecord on userInInstallRecord.id = ir.customer LEFT JOIN user as userInMaintainRecord on userInMaintainRecord.id = mr.customer LEFT JOIN user as userInRepairRecord on userInRepairRecord.id = rr.customer
LEFT JOIN repair_actual_info as rai on rai.repair_record_id = rr.id LEFT JOIN parts_info on parts_info.repair_actual_info_id = rai.id
where 1=1
and ( (userInInstallRecord.`account` = #{userName} and ir.install_status = 2 ) -- 2：安装OK(客户未确认); or (userInMaintainRecord.`account` = #{userName} and mr.maintain_status =3) -- 3：保养完成(客户未确认) or (userInRepairRecord.`account` = #{userName} and (rr.`status` = 3 or parts_info.parts_status =2 or parts_info.parts_status =3 )) -- 3：维修成功(客户未确认) -- 1: 无需回寄，其他表示需要寄回(具体 2：未寄回，3：已寄回（待确认），4：已确认) )
order by mr.maintain_date_actual desc, rr.repair_end_time desc,ir.install_actual_time desc
